channel.title: Just a reminder on herobrine
channel.description:
hes not real I feel I need to address this because there are people who not only claim he's real, but that they've seen him personally. Also, here are some "facts" about Herobrine. Copied straight from YouTube, too lazy to correct.
Herobrine has been removed? a total of 11 times
6*
the disc name is 11
Okay
, his eyes look like 11 if turned﻿ on their side
FW:fwd:Fwd:FD: SO CREEPY!!1! This means nothing.
and he wasn't removed in 1.1. Scary
this is probably the only fact here
Minecraft's official release was on 11.11.11 O_O?
No, it wasn't. It was the 18th. If you're going to lie, do it in a more complicated way that people can't easily look up. Herobrine originated from a creepypasta made a while back, and not only has notch (as well as the rest of the mojang team) denied the existence of Herobrine, C418 denied the relation of the music disc "11" with herobrine in anyway. Go ahead, search "herobrine is real" on youtube, and look at the comments. This one is by far my favorite.
herobrine was a hacker and﻿ when notch said he removed it him in the update he meant he put a firewall around mine craft

item.title: Just a reminder on herobrine
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

he is all ghost and is ghostly
no shit

Read full topic

item.title: Just a reminder on herobrine
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

The weird “sandstone well” he found is a naturally generated well that showed up in the 12w04a snapshot. But the stories people make up are hilarious.
“I was on a server with my friend and we didnt let anyone else on and we see a guy with glowing eyes and he is herobrine and he is all ghost and is ghostly”

Read full topic

item.title: Just a reminder on herobrine
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:21, topic:447500”]This by far is the best.

that is not notch i have saw a live enter﻿ view

Edit: Holy crap.

I don’t think Herobrine is fake. Last night, I was playing Minecraft, and I built myself a house in the desert and I ran around to see if I could find a NPC village. While walking around,I’ve noticed a kind of fountain in the middle of the desert. So I got close and noticed it was all made of sandstone and﻿ sandstone slab and had a deep hole filled with water. O.o[/quote]

HES OBVIOUSLY TOO SCARED AND WAS TOLD BY HEROBRINE TO SAY THAT SO PEOPLE DON’T SUSPECT HEROBRINE COMING UP TO THEM

I love how they tell these stories and act like it happened to them

Read full topic

item.title: Just a reminder on herobrine
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

This by far is the best.

that is not notch i have saw a live enter﻿ view

Edit: Holy crap.

I don't think Herobrine is fake. Last night, I was playing Minecraft, and I built myself a house in the desert and I ran around to see if I could find a NPC village. While walking around,I've noticed a kind of fountain in the middle of the desert. So I got close and noticed it was all made of sandstone and﻿ sandstone slab and had a deep hole filled with water. O.o

item.title: Just a reminder on herobrine
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

I saw Herobrain in snapshot 12w24a. I'm pretty sure it was him. it was singel player. And he had Glowing eye. But he ran away from me. Is he﻿ moved in again???
real i am being haunted by him :(﻿
Holy shit! I was just mining at like level 10, and I found a long hallway with a﻿ sign on the﻿ wall that says "Diamond Sweet Spot" I shitted bricks!
I havent﻿ ceen u but i believer
Herobrine is real my friend and i were playing on our server with no one on and im op so i would see who is on and then all﻿ of suddly he started stalking my friend and i we were both scared out of our minds

Come on, join me in the search.

Read full topic

item.title: Just a reminder on herobrine
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:6, topic:447500”][quote]I havent seen herobrine in 1.2.5 but i seen signs i saw a sign in my world that said
Only﻿ god can protect u know ~Herobrine[/quote]

Me and my friend spawned on a Newley generated world in multiplayer we explored for a while than decided to go mining after a while we fell into a man-made room than we went forwards through the room but then all fo a sudden I heard footsteps and I turned around and saw herobrine…! Ps. It was ben﻿ (my friend) using mob des use

guys herobrine has a very slim chance to spawn in place of a normal mob (skeleton, zombie, etc) and he is just a glitch, not intented, glitch from multiplayer maybe, wrongly textured eyes, he is/was a glitch!

SHUTUP. notch took out herobrine but still i﻿ see him

hes﻿ a glitch, not intended to be there. the eye’s are a texture glitch.

What happens if you play﻿ all the records at the same time? The records have been broken into pieces. Causing The recorded 11 would be the minecrafter trying to find all the records but goes insane and kills himself

herobrine is real… ive seen him! most sightings are real, but there is an account named herobrine. theres an old bukkit plugin where you can make npc. if you give them the name of a real account, it gives﻿ them their skin! i did herobrine and steve popped up (which happens if there isnt an account with that name) then it glitched out, and tve pupils dissapeared!

YOU CANT MAKE THIS SHIT UP.

@Hat trix, please tell me you’re just joking.[/quote]

lol, no there is actually someone who plays named herobrine.

Read full topic

SHUTUP. notch took out herobrine but still i﻿ see him
hes﻿ a glitch, not intended to be there. the eye's are a texture glitch.
What happens if you play﻿ all the records at the same time? The records have been broken into pieces. Causing The recorded 11 would be the minecrafter trying to find all the records but goes insane and kills himself
herobrine is real... ive seen him! most sightings are real, but there is an account named herobrine. theres an old bukkit plugin where you can make npc. if you give them the name of a real account, it gives﻿ them their skin! i did herobrine and steve popped up (which happens if there isnt an account with that name) then it glitched out, and tve pupils dissapeared!

YOU CANT MAKE THIS SHIT UP.

@Hat trix, please tell me you’re just joking.
